author: Special Correspondent
text:
Irate public staged a road roko at Pallankoil Cholan Nagar near here on Tuesday demanding that the sanctioned road development work be carried out immediately.

The stretch from Vilakkudi to Pallankoil on the Tiruthuraipoondi-Mannargudi section is woefully damaged and troubles all road users and motorists.

Protesters alleged that the sanction for developing and repairing the stretch was issued several months ago but work was not started till now. The negligence on the part of the officials was taking a toll of the public and road users, the protesters alleged, demanding immediate action on repairing the road.

Upon information, tahsildar Palanivel, Deputy Superintendent of Police Kannadasan, and Highways Assistant Engineer Manibalan rushed to the spot, pacified the protesters and assured them that work would be taken up shortly. Following that the protest was withdrawn.
title: Residents want road work to be taken up
